name: ethernaut-challenges
description: Play the Open Zeppelin ethernaut challenges in the cli

scripts.compile: cd test/fixture-projects/basic-project && npx hardhat compile && cd ../../..
scripts.test: npm run fix-package && npm run compile && mocha --exit --timeout 60000 --require '../common/setup-tests.js' --recursive '../../**/*.test.js' --ignore '../../fixture-projects/**/*'
